2F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1 1w1a1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1a1 1b1r1i1l2i1a1n1t1 1c1h1e1m1i1s1t1 1a1n1d1 1a1 1m1a1s1t1e1r1 1o1f1 1X1-1r1a1y1 1c1r1y1s1t1a1l2o1g1r1a1p1h1y1,1 1a1n1 1i1m1a1g1i1n1g1 1t1e1c1h1n1i1q1u1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1r1e1v1e1a1l1s1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1l1e1c1u1l1a1r1 1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1e1 1o1f1 1m1a1t2e1r1 1b1a1s1e1d1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1t2e1r1n1 1o1f1 1s1c1a1t2e1r1e1d1 1X1-1r1a1y1 1b1e1a1m1s1.1 1H1e1r1 1e1a1r1l1y1 1r1e1s1e1a1r1c1h1 1i1n1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1m1i1c1r1o1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1e1s1 1o1f1 1c1a1r1b1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1g1r1a1p1h1i1t1e1 1a1r1e1 1s1t1i1l2 1c1i1t1e1d1,1 1b1u1t1 1h1e1r1 1w1o1r1k1 1w1i1t1h1 1D1N1A1 1w1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1s1t1 1s1i1g1n1i1f1i1c1a1n1t1 1-1 1a1n1d1 1i1t1 1m1a1y1 1h1a1v1e1 1w1o1n1 1t1h1r1e2 1m1e1n1 1a1 1N1o1b1e1l1.1
2W1h1i1l1e1 1a1t1 1K1i1n1g1'1s1 1C1o1l2e1g1e1 1L1o1n1d1o1n1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1e1a1r1l1y1 1s1,1 1F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1 1w1a1s1 1c1l1o1s1e1 1t1o1 1p1r1o1v1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1d1o1u1b1l1e1-1h1e1l1i1x1 1t1h1e1o1r1y1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1c1a1p1t1u1r1i1n1g1 1"1p1h1o1t1o1g1r1a1p1h1 1"1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1f1i1n1e1s1t1 1i1m1a1g1e1 1o1f1 1a1 1D1N1A1 1m1o1l1e1c1u1l1e1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1t1i1m1e1.1 1B1u1t1 1t1h1e1n1 1b1o1t1h1 1W1a1t1s1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1C1r1i1c1k1 1g1o1t1 1a1 1p1e2k1 1a1t1 1F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1'1s1 1w1o1r1k1:1 1H1e1r1 1c1o1l2e1a1g1u1e1,1 1W1i1l1k1i1n1s1,1 1s1h1o1w1e1d1 1W1a1t1s1o1n1 1p1h1o1t1o1g1r1a1p1h1 1,1 1a1n1d1 1M1a1x1 1P1e1r1u1t1z1,1 1a1 1m1e1m1b1e1r1 1o1f1 1K1i1n1g1'1s1 1M1e1d1i1c1a1l1 1R1e1s1e1a1r1c1h1 1C1o1u1n1c1i1l1,1 1h1a1n1d1e1d1 1C1r1i1c1k1 1u1n1p1u1b1l1i1s1h1e1d1 1d1a1t1a1 1f1r1o1m1 1a1 1r1e1p1o1r1t1 1F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1 1s1u1b1m1i1t2e1d1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1u1n1c1i1l1.1 1I1n1 1,1 1W1a1t1s1o1n1 1a1n1d1 1C1r1i1c1k1 1p1u1b1l1i1s1h1e1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1i1c1o1n1i1c1 1p1a1p1e1r1 1i1n1 1N1a1t1u1r1e1,1 1l1o2s1e1l1y1 1c1i1t1i1n1g1 1F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1,1 1w1h1o1s1e1 1"1s1u1p2o1r1t1i1n1g1"1 1s1t1u1d1y1 1a1l1s1o1 1a1p2e1a1r1e1d1 1i1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1i1s2u1e1.1
2F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1 1l1e1f1t1 1K1i1n1g1'1s1 1i1n1 1a1 1l1o1n1g1-1p1l1a1n2e1d1 1m1o1v1e1 1t1o1 1j1o1i1n1 1J1.1D1.1 1B1e1r1n1a1l1'1s1 1l1a1b1 1a1t1 1B1i1r1k1b1e1c1k1 1C1o1l2e1g1e1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1s1h1e1 1d1i1s1c1o1v1e1r1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1r1u1c1t1u1r1e1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1t1o1b1a1c2o1 1m1o1s1a1i1c1 1v1i1r1u1s1.1 1B1u1t1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1i1m1e1 1o1f1 1h1e1r1 1c1a1r1e2r1,1 1s1h1e1 1d1e1v1e1l1o1p1e1d1 1o1v1a1r1i1a1n1 1c1a1n1c1e1r1 1-1 1p1e1r1h1a1p1s1 1d1u1e1 1t1o1 1h1e1r1 1e1x1t1e1n1s1i1v1e1 1X1-1r1a1y1 1w1o1r1k1.1 1F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1 1c1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1d1 1w1o1r1k1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1l1a1b1 1u1n1t1i1l1 1h1e1r1 1d1e1a1t1h1 1i1n1.1
2"1A1s1 1a1 1s1c1i1e1n1t1i1s1t1,1 1M1i1s2 1F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1 1w1a1s1 1d1i1s1t1i1n1g1u1i1s1h1e1d1 1b1y1 1e1x1t1r1e1m1e1 1c1l1a1r1i1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1p1e1r1f1e1c1t1i1o1n1 1i1n1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1s1h1e1 1u1n1d1e1r1t1o2k1,1"1 1B1e1r1n1a1l1 1w1r1o1t1e1 1i1n1 1h1e1r1 1o1b1i1t1u1a1r1y1,1 1p1u1b1l1i1s1h1e1d1 1i1n1 1N1a1t1u1r1e1.1 1T1h1o1u1g1h1 1i1t1'1s1 1h1e1r1 1a1c1h1i1e1v1e1m1e1n1t1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1l1o1s1e1 1c1o1l2e1a1g1u1e1s1 1a1d1m1i1r1e1d1,1 1m1o1s1t1 1r1e1m1e1m1b1e1r1 1F1r1a1n1k1l1i1n1 1f1o1r1 1h1o1w1 1s1h1e1 1w1a1s1 1f1o1r1g1o1t2e1n1.1 1-1 1C1a1r1l1 1E1n1g1e1l1k1i1n1g1
